title: 2D Side-View JavaScript Game
description: 2D Side-View Shooting game is a classic genre of video game that has been enjoyed by players for decades. With the power of modern web technologies like JavaScript and the Canvas API, it is now easier than ever to create engaging and immersive games that can be played right in the browser.

title: Front End Development – Personal Portfolio
description: Utilized Figma during the design process and employed JavaScript, CSS, and HTML to develop a personal portfolio website.

title: Mobile App Development – Survey Android App
description: Built an Android survey app with Kotlin and Android Studio, featuring a local SQL database that enables staff to create surveys and receive interactive feedback in the form of graphs based on student responses.

title: Object-Oriented Programming – Module Picker
description: Created a JavaFX-based application with a GUI interface, which requires user accounts and enables final year module selection based on the chosen course.
